books.author: by Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese in World War II.
books.name: UNBROKEN

books.author: by Edward Klein
books.description: A journalist describes animosity behind the alliance between the Clinton and Obama families.
books.name: BLOOD FEUD

books.author: by Piper Kerman
books.description: A Brooklyn woman’s prison memoir. The basis for the Netflix series, originally published in 2010.
books.name: ORANGE IS THE NEW BLACK

books.author: by Daniel James Brown
books.description: The University of Washington’s eight-oar crew and their quest for gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics.
books.name: THE BOYS IN THE BOAT

books.author: by Hillary Rodham Clinton
books.description: Clinton’s memoir focuses on her years as secretary of state and her views on America’s role in the world.
books.name: HARD CHOICES

books.author: by Todd Burpo with Lynn Vincent
books.description: A 3-year-old’s encounter with Jesus during an appendectomy; the basis of the movie.
books.name: HEAVEN IS FOR REAL

books.author: by Marcus Luttrell with Patrick Robinson
books.description: The only survivor of a Navy SEALs operation in northern Afghanistan describes the battle and his escape. First published in 2007; the basis for the movie.
books.name: LONE SURVIVOR

books.author: by Ben Carson with Candy Carson
books.description: Carson, a retired pediatric neurosurgeon, now a Fox News contributor, offers solutions to problems in health and education based on capitalism, not government.
books.name: ONE NATION

books.author: by Steven D. Levitt and Stephen J. Dubner
books.description: How to solve problems creatively, from the authors of “Freakonomics.”
books.name: THINK LIKE A FREAK

books.author: by Thomas Piketty
books.description: A French economist’s analysis of centuries of economic history predicts worsening inequality and proposes solutions.
books.name: CAPITAL IN THE TWENTY-FIRST CENTURY

books.author: by Gillian Gill
books.description: An account of Queen Victoria’s marriage to Prince Albert; first published in 2009.
books.name: WE TWO

books.author: by Malcolm Gladwell
books.description: Why some people succeed; from the author of "Blink" and "The Tipping Point."
books.name: OUTLIERS

books.author: by Joan Rivers
books.description: Humorous reflections about life, pop culture and celebrities.
books.name: DIARY OF A MAD DIVA

books.author: by Jeannette Walls
books.description: The author recalls a bizarre childhood during which she was constantly moved from place to place.
books.name: THE GLASS CASTLE

books.author: by Jon Meacham
books.description: An account of the friendship between Franklin D. Roosevelt and Winston Churchill; first published in 2003.
books.name: FRANKLIN AND WINSTON
